name: Eyelash Curler
categories: Tools & Brushes, Beauty Tools, Eyelash Curlers
about: What it is:An award-winning eyelash curler with an edge-free design that prevents pinching for an eye-opening, glamorous curl..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This eyelash curler crimps and curls lashes to perfection. Its broad curve grabs every lash from inner to outer corner, no matter the eye shape, for the perfect eye-framing fringe. The flexible silicone rubber pads are gentle and safe on lashes, and it also includes one replacement pad.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Open the curler and position it at the base of your lashes. .-Gently squeeze down on lashes. .-For the fullest lashes, move the curler up away from the base and squeeze again in the middle of the lash. .-Press one more time close to the tip of the lashes.  .-Use a tissue or dry cloth to wipe the eyelash curler and silicone pads clean between uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best curler I’ve ever used. Worth the cost for sure.

reviews.review_text: after using this for the past few weeks, i noticed a major difference compared to other lash curlers, including the elf lash curler. this specific curler really emphasizes my lashes- they usually are short and straight , but with this, they look more defined and lifted

reviews.review_title: DOES THE JOB WITHOUT DAMAGING THE LASHES.

reviews.review_text: One of the best eyelash curlers I have ever used. It does the job that needs to be done. It’s been almost 3 months that I have been using this and I don’t see any damage to my eyelashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you have heavily a hooded eyes, this will help some, but it’s not a miracle worker.  The Social Media girlies have this as some Mecca of a product.  It curls well.  It holds better than most but it’s also dependent on what mascara you’re using and what your eye shape is.   My hooded eyes push my eyelashes down regardless.  There’s no product in the photos if they upload.
